tool_description: an API showing all climate change around the world
name: firstJs
title: firstJs

api_list.name: get climate change from specific resource
api_list.description: get climate change from specific resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://firstjs.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "firstjs.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
